channel.title: Gonna tweak past tracks with V5?
channel.description:
I've been going back through some stuff on SC, thinking what I would want to tweak. I want to tweak the drums on a few pieces, and explore layering in some FX (sounds, not delay, etc…) to some pieces. (I've always considered my SC 'releases' as demos, at best. So, I don't consider them locked.)
  Wondering if anyone else plans to revisit tracks they've already put out there and adjust anything using V5.
  **What track(s) would you change and how?**

item.title: Gonna tweak past tracks with V5?
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
I don’t think I’ll change any. From now on I’m just going to try and create the best tracks possible with Auxy 5.

Read full topic

item.source: Gonna tweak past tracks with V5?

item.title: Gonna tweak past tracks with V5?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
See, for me, even though my stuff is on SC, I still plan to have a ‘proper’ release.
I treat all my stuff on SC like demos.

Until they’re released, I’m always thinking how I can improve them. If V5 gives me a fresh idea for a track that’s already up on SC, then I’ll tweak it, so that the version that’s out there is the best version I can make it.
For the same reason, if there’s something that I felt fell short in the V4 version, and V5 offers a solution for that, I’m going to change it.

If I considered SC as the final place for my stuff, then I’d probably let it slide (god knows I’ve got enough new stuff to crack on with). But, V5 allows me to now try out things that get the tracks closer to what I had in mind when I first made them.

Read full topic

item.title: Gonna tweak past tracks with V5?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I actually will be changing my track Auxyquest because there will be more appropriate percussion (for example actual cowbell) and I can sample my voice inside auxy instead of elsewhere. ALSO, I’ll be able to make sure I pronounce Lenberg’s name correctly. xD

It’ll just be small tweaks though, most likely not going to delete the old track as it’s one of my largest tracks I’ve uploaded as E/E xD

Read full topic
